org.finra.herd.dao

Interface JdbcDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcDaoImpl

    public interface JdbcDao
    DAO layer for executing arbitrary JDBC statements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JdbcStatementResultSet query(org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate, String sql, Integer maxResult)
      Executes a JDBC query.
      int update(org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate, String sql)
      Executes a JDBC update.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        int update(org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate,
           String sql)
        Executes a JDBC update.
        Parameters:
        jdbcTemplate - JDBC template to use
        sql - SQL statement to execute
        Returns:
        number of rows updated

      • query

        JdbcStatementResultSet query(org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate,
                             String sql,
                             Integer maxResult)
        Executes a JDBC query. Optionally, the number of rows returned may be limited by setting maxResult.
        Parameters:
        jdbcTemplate - JDBC template to use
        sql - SQL statement to execute
        maxResult - The maximum number of rows returned, or null
        Returns:
        the JdbcStatementResultSet
